person.persName: Marmaduke Beckwith "Buck" Morton, Jr. (Logan County, Kentucky, clerk.)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, clerk and deputy sheriff. Kentucky native. Son of William I. Morton and Clarissa McCleland Morton. Attended Bethel College in Logan County, Kentucky. Merchant clerk in Logan County in 1860. Household owned sixteen enslaved persons in Logan County in 1860. Deputy clerk of the Logan Circuit Court in 1861. Deputy sheriff in Logan County in 1864.
